attributes.action: Provide temporary country lock down due to coronavirus
attributes.additional_details:
The evidence how to calculate the actual coronivries life infection cases and examples from other countries should be a lesson for British government 

https://medium.com/@tomaspueyo/coronavirus-act-today-or-people-will-die-f4d3d9cd99ca
attributes.background:
Follow the measures and evidence and learn from mistakes from other countries about the spread of coronavirus.
To prevent NHS being overloaded, to prevent people death, to prevent further spread of coronavirus, please implement temporary country lockdown!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301397

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
